page.title: 07LITTLE WITLEY HOMELIFE-2
page.content: Families share a cooked evening{meal while many children have a sandwich lunch. Sunday lunch (or more commonly Sunday supper) is a special meal eaten together by the family. The television, telephone, washing machine, dishwasher, hot water, central heating are accepted{home {necessities.}Microwave ovens, video recorders and computers are desirable home accessories. Watching{television}even at breakfast seems to be a main home entertainment enjoyed by all. Children like bicycling, reading, playing sport or computer and other games. The drinking of tea and coffee with friends is a{social pastime.}Sharing a meal with friends at home occurs as often as vsiting a pub, theatre or restaurant. Christmas and Easter and birthdays are also special occasions.
